		command = { }
	}
}

event = {
id = 278001
country = COL
random = no
style = 2

date = { day = 6 month = february year = 1948 }
offset = 25
deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1963 }

name = "Recall the Mission from US Military School"
desc = "Our mission from US Military School, led by General Pinilla, has been abroad for some time now, it's high time we finally recall them and see what the world's foremost Great Power has to teach our armed forces" 
picture = "news_paper"

action = {
name = "Let us see what we have learned..."
command = {  type = setflag which = COL_MIL }
}
}

event = {
	id = 278002
	country = COL
	style = 2

	name = "The government is accused of censorship just two month before the election."
	desc = "Some newspapers are accusing us of using censorship to let us keep the power, that isn't true!"
	picture = "election"

	date = { day = 6 month = march year = 1948 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 50
		name = "Put the author in jail"
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -1 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	}

	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 50
		name = "Ignore his words."
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 278003
	country = COL
	style = 2

	name = "The Magazine Critica does it again."
	desc = "The magazine has published five articles about the so called censorship, we should have arrested the author while we had the chance!"
	picture = "election"

	date = { day = 29 month = march year = 1948 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 70
		name = "This time arrest the whole newspaper!"
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = -1 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 5 }
	}

	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "This won't probably disturb the government."
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = democratic value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 278004
	random = no
	country = COL
	picture = "election"
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = COL
		}
	}

	name = "General Elections"
	desc = "La Colombia si presentava nel 1948 in una situazione generale disastrata. Il venir meno degli Stati Uniti negli interessi colombiani, esponeva la fragile democrazia colombiana al rischio degli estremisti di destra e di sinistra."

	date = { day = 6 month = may year = 1948 }

	action = {
		ai_chance = 40
		name = "PCC - Partido Comunista de Colombia (Communist)"

		command = { type = setflag which = COL_COMMUNIST }
		command = { type = setflag which = COL_SOC }		

		#command = { type = headofstate which = 175020 } #Sellor
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 175034 } #Sellor

		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 4 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = freedom value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = professional_army value = 4 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = interventionism value = 5 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = defense_lobby value = 5 }

		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -50 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -50 }

		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -100 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -100 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = -100 }

		command = { type = relation which = PER value = -50 }
		command = { type = relation which = PAN value = -50 }
		command = { type = relation which = BRA value = -30 }
		command = { type = relation which = VEN value = -30 }
		command = { type = relation which = ECU value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = ARG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHI value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = BOL value = -10 }

		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = 100 }
		command = { type = relation which = CHC value = 100 }
		command = { type = relation which = SIB value = 50 }

		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 20
		name = "UDC - Union Democratica Colombiana (Democratic)"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }

		#command = { type = headofstate which = 175011 } #Montejo
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 175025 } #Camargo

		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 6 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = -1 }
		command = { type = setflag which = COL_DEMOCRATICS }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = PAN value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = BRA value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = VEN value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = PER value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = ECU value = 10 }
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 40
		name = "FNPC - Falange Nacional Patriotica de Colombia (Fascist)"
		command = { type = setflag which = COL_FASCIST }
		command = { type = dissent value = -5 }

		#command = { type = headofstate which = 175018 } #Valdez
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 175031 } #Valdez

		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 175031 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 2 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 3 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 5 }
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 9 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = SOV value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = PAN value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = BRA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = VEN value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = PER value = 10 }
		command = { type = relation which = ECU value = -10 }
	}
}
